response.explain: The previous action code successfully turned on the stove. The next step is to put the tray with the bacon on the stove. However, the tray is currently under the griddle and inside the stove, so we need to first take the tray out of the stove.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the stove.
(2) Turn on the stove.
(3) Take the tray out of the stove.
(4) Put the tray with the bacon on the stove.
(5) Cook the bacon on the stove.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    tray = registry(env,"tray_156")
    EasyGrasp(robot, tray)
    donothing(env)
